attributes.action: regulate holiday and travel companies charging almost double their prices during school holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As responsible parents, we do not wish to take our children out of school during term-time - and now that the school regulations have forbidden it we have no choice to book our annual holidays in synch with school holidays. Why, at PEAK season are holiday and travel companies allowed to charge almost double prices during this time. Surely it is time for the Government to take part-responsibility in controlling the price hikes as they are also responsible for governing the holidays.
The companies are holding the parents to ransom as the only other alternative is to stay at home.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
